subject: Broken part.
description_text:
Hi. I purchased a handbrake from you guys about 6 months ago. Its worked
great however today the 2 bolts that hold in the aluminium block snapped
during regular use. Someone told me that this happens but I told them they
must have misused or abused the product and now it happened to me. It has
been less than a year of ownership and I dont have the money to replace it
right now. Do you guys sell the parts or upgrades for the bolts that
snapped?

U Davis
